metadata.title: de-Winter syndrome; ST-T changes equivalent of acute myocardial infarction

FIGREF0.text: Fig. 1: An electrocardiogram of the patients on arrival to the emergency room revealed tall T-waves and ST depression in precordial leads.

FIGREF1.text: Fig. 2: Images taken from patient's angiography.

BIBREF0.title: A novel electrocardiographic sign of an ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction-equivalent: de Winter syndrome

BIBREF1.title: The de Winter ST-T pattern: an equivalent to acute coronary syndrome with ST-segment elevation
